inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('DualWieldArmorClass', 'Stackable', 10); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Dual Wielding Defense
description: You have trained in the use of your off hand weapon as a shield.  You gain a +10 bonus to Defense while dual wielding.
